content:
Hey! We currently use inconsistent terminology for polls -- the UI says "New/add choice", where https://zulip.com/help/create-a-poll refers to options. We should consolidate these.

Thoughts on which one we like better? (Or a third alternative that's better yet. ;))
CC @Nehal Sharma , as I think we'll want to unify the terminology for creating and editing polls as part of #22370.
Personally, I have a clear preference for options. Choices sounds more generic I feel
To me, "choice" implies than one option is chosen -- whereas "options" doe sa slightly better job of conveying that this is select-as-many-as-you-want.

Cool, makes sense to me.

@Nehal Sharma would you be up for putting up a quick PR to rename choice -> option in the poll editing UI?
